goal: HyTrustâ€™s mission is to enable trustworthy private, hybrid and public cloud infrastructure for global enterprises, government agencies and service providers. HyTrust Workload Security Solutions reduce risk by automating compliance and enforcing security-based policies across private and public clouds.  HyTrust solutions focus on securing the cloud infrastructure at the administrative layer, enabling enterprises and governments to transform to software defined infrastructure.  HyTrust solutions also secure the actual virtual or cloud workload, preventing them from data breach or violations of data sovereignty.
